LanguageData.Disease_Fibrodysplasia.label: Fibrodysplasia
LanguageData.Disease_Fibrodysplasia.letterText: {0} of your settlers {1}.\n\nSome parts of your colonists are infected with a disease that will slowly turn flesh to brittle bone. If not treated, then the infected part of the body dies completely and the disease is transmitted to a body part.
LanguageData.Disease_NeurofibromatousWorms.label: Neurofibromatous Worms
LanguageData.Disease_NeurofibromatousWorms.letterText: У {0} of your settlers {1}.\n\nNeurofibromatous worms affect parts of the brain responsible for vision and hearing. If they are not cured in time, the colonist will be left deaf and blind!
LanguageData.Disease_ZeroMechanites.label: Zero-Mechanites
LanguageData.Disease_ZeroMechanites.letterText: {0} of your settlers {1}. \n\nZero-Mechanites overclock some bodily functions. They increase wound healing speed and work speed, but also tiredness, hunger. If you do not treat them, they may have more severe effects.
